verses.verse: Then Nahash <S%H5176><s%> the Ammonite <S%H5984><s%> came up, <S%H5927><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> against Jabesh Gilead: <S%H3003><s%> and all the men <S%H582><s%> of Jabesh <S%H3003><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Nahash, <S%H5176><s%> "Make <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with us, <S%H5647><s%> and we will serve you."

Nahash <S%H5176><s%> the Ammonite <S%H5984><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H2063><s%> "On this condition I will make <S%H3772><s%> it with you, <S%H3225><s%> that all your right eyes <S%H5869><s%> be put out; <S%H5365><s%> and I will lay <S%H7760><s%> it for a reproach <S%H2781><s%> on all Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"

The elders <S%H2205><s%> of Jabesh <S%H3003><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H7651><s%> "Give us seven days, <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H7503><s%> we may send <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to all the borders <S%H1366><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and then, <S%H3467><s%> if there is no one to save us, <S%H3318><s%> we will come out to you."

Then the messengers <S%H4397><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Gibeah <S%H1390><s%> of Saul, <S%H7586><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of the people: <S%H5971><s%> and all the people <S%H5971><s%> lifted up <S%H5375><s%> their voice, <S%H6963><s%> and wept. <S%H1058><s%>

Behold, <S%H7586><s%> Saul came <S%H935><s%> following <S%H310><s%> the oxen <S%H1241><s%> out of the field; <S%H7704><s%> and Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "What ails the people <S%H5971><s%> that they weep? <S%H1058><s%>" They told <S%H5608><s%> him the words <S%H1697><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> of Jabesh. <S%H3003><s%>

The Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> came <S%H6743><s%> mightily on Saul <S%H7586><s%> when he heard <S%H8085><s%> those words, <S%H1697><s%> and his anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> greatly. <S%H3966><s%>

He took <S%H3947><s%> a yoke <S%H6776><s%> of oxen, <S%H1241><s%> and cut them in pieces, <S%H5408><s%> and sent <S%H7971><s%> them throughout all the borders <S%H1366><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of messengers, <S%H4397><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Whoever doesn't <S%H3318><s%> come forth after <S%H310><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> and after <S%H310><s%> Samuel, <S%H8050><s%> so shall it be done <S%H6213><s%> to his oxen. <S%H1241><s%>" The dread <S%H6343><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> on the people, <S%H5971><s%> and they came out <S%H3318><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>

He numbered <S%H6485><s%> them in Bezek; <S%H966><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand, <S%H505><s%> and the men <S%H376><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> thousand. <S%H505><s%>

They said <S%H559><s%> to the messengers <S%H4397><s%> who came, <S%H935><s%> "Thus you shall tell <S%H559><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Jabesh Gilead, <S%H3003><s%> <S%H4279><s%> 'Tomorrow, by the time the sun <S%H8121><s%> is hot, <S%H2527><s%> you shall have deliverance. <S%H8668><s%>'" The messengers <S%H4397><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of Jabesh; <S%H3003><s%> and they were glad. <S%H8055><s%>

Therefore the men <S%H582><s%> of Jabesh <S%H3003><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> we will come out <S%H3318><s%> to you, <S%H6213><s%> and you shall do with us all that seems <S%H5869><s%> good to you. <S%H2896><s%>"

It was so on the next day, <S%H4283><s%> that Saul <S%H7586><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> in three <S%H7969><s%> companies; <S%H7218><s%> and they came <S%H935><s%> into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the camp <S%H4264><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%> watch, <S%H821><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> the Ammonites <S%H5983><s%> until the heat <S%H2527><s%> of the day: <S%H3117><s%> and it happened, <S%H7604><s%> that those who remained were scattered, <S%H6327><s%> so that no two <S%H8147><s%> of them were left <S%H7604><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>

The people <S%H5971><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Samuel, <S%H8050><s%> "Who is he who said, <S%H559><s%> <S%H7586><s%> 'Shall Saul reign <S%H4427><s%> over us? <S%H5414><s%>' Bring those men, <S%H582><s%> that we may put them to death! <S%H4191><s%>"

Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "There shall not a man <S%H376><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%> this day; <S%H3117><s%> for today <S%H3117><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has worked <S%H6213><s%> deliverance <S%H8668><s%> in Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"

Then Samuel <S%H8050><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Come, <S%H3212><s%> and let us go <S%H3212><s%> to Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> and renew <S%H2318><s%> the kingdom there. <S%H4410><s%>"

All the people <S%H5971><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to Gilgal; <S%H1537><s%> and there they made Saul <S%H7586><s%> king <S%H4427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in Gilgal; <S%H1537><s%> and there they offered <S%H2076><s%> sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and there Saul <S%H7586><s%> and all the men <S%H582><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> rejoiced <S%H8055><s%> greatly. <S%H3966><s%>
